section.heading: Statutory trust as entity.
section.text: A statutory trust is an entity separate from its trustees and beneficial owners.

annotations.annotation: The 2013 amendment by D.C. Law 19-210 substituted “is” for “shall be.”

annoGroup.heading: Editor's Notes
annoGroup.text: Uniform Law: This section is based on § 302 of the Uniform Statutory Trust Entity Act.
Application of Law 19-210: Section 7 of D.C. Law 19-210 provided that the act shall apply as of January 1, 2012.
